title: Game randomly crashing out.
body: Game suddnely got mute then for the next 15 min i had an increasing frame drop down to 5 fps, so it decided to reconnect, I get stucked on the menu screen and I can't do anything on my PC , nothing would work. I don't even know. Any ideas what might have happenned. Never had that one before, and I really don't want t get thrown into the 20 min wait queue.

replies.body: I'd like to help out here but I need a more definitive explanation by what you mean by crashing or nothing would work.  Let me know what you're seeing exactly or any error messages that you see.  In the meantime, I recommend removing any third party programs that you have running like play tv or lolrecorder, as they've been known to cause unexpected crashes.  Let me know!
